trans-unit.source: default, no index is enabled; variable lookup is performed using exact match of the record key and a search key
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,不启用索引;变量查询使用记录键和搜索键的完全匹配来执行。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory for storing temporary files that hold client request bodies. After installation, the directory can always be changed in the nginx.conf configuration file using the client_body_temp_path directive. By default the directory is named prefix/client_body_temp.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于存储包含客户端请求正文的临时文件的目录。安装后，始终可以使用client_body_temp_path指令在 nginx.conf 配置文件中更改目录。默认情况下，该目录名为 prefix/client_body_temp / client_body_temp。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory for storing temporary files with data received from FastCGI servers. After installation, the directory can always be changed in the nginx.conf configuration file using the fastcgi_temp_path directive. By default the directory is named prefix/fastcgi_temp.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个目录，用于存储包含从FastCGI服务器接收到的数据的临时文件。安装后，始终可以使用fastcgi_temp_path指令在 nginx.conf 配置文件中更改目录。默认情况下，该目录名为 prefix/fastcgi_temp / fastcgi_temp。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory for storing temporary files with data received from SCGI servers. After installation, the directory can always be changed in the nginx.conf configuration file using the scgi_temp_path directive. By default the directory is named prefix/scgi_temp.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个目录，用于存储包含从SCGI服务器接收到的数据的临时文件。安装后，可以始终使用scgi_temp_path指令在 nginx.conf 配置文件中更改目录。默认情况下，该目录名为 prefix/scgi_temp / scgi_temp。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory for storing temporary files with data received from proxied servers. After installation, the directory can always be changed in the nginx.conf configuration file using the proxy_temp_path directive. By default the directory is named prefix/proxy_temp.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个目录，用于存储带有从代理服务器接收到的数据的临时文件。安装后，始终可以使用proxy_temp_path指令在 nginx.conf 配置文件中更改目录。默认情况下，该目录名为 prefix/proxy_temp / proxy_temp。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory for storing temporary files with data received from uwsgi servers. After installation, the directory can always be changed in the nginx.conf configuration file using the uwsgi_temp_path directive. By default the directory is named prefix/uwsgi_temp.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个目录，用于存储包含从uwsgi服务器接收到的数据的临时文件。安装后，始终可以使用uwsgi_temp_path指令在 nginx.conf 配置文件中更改目录。默认情况下，该目录名为 prefix/uwsgi_temp / uwsgi_temp。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory that will keep Perl modules.
trans-unit.target: 定义了一个保存Perl模块的目录。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory that will keep server files. This same directory will also be used for all relative paths set by configure (except for paths to libraries sources) and in the nginx.conf configuration file. It is set to the /usr/local/nginx directory by default.
trans-unit.target: 定义将保留服务器文件的目录。此同一目录还将用于由 configure 设置的所有相对路径（库源路径除外）和 nginx.conf 配置文件中的路径。默认情况下，它设置为 /usr/local/nginx 目录。

trans-unit.source: defines a directory where nginx dynamic modules will be installed. By default the prefix/modules directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义将在其中安装nginx动态模块的目录。默认情况下，使用 prefix/modules 目录。

trans-unit.source: defines a server name and an optional URI prefix. A server name can have an “*” at the beginning or end. During the checking, the server’s port in the “Referer” field is ignored;
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器名称和可选的URI前缀。服务器名称的开头或结尾可以带有“ * ”。在检查过程中，“ Referer”字段中的服务器端口将被忽略；

trans-unit.source: defines a time after which an element is removed from the cache if it has not been accessed during this time; by default, it is 60 seconds;
trans-unit.target: 定义了一个时间,如果一个元素在这段时间内没有被访问,则从缓存中删除;默认为60秒。

trans-unit.source: defines the URI used in health check requests, by default, “/”.
trans-unit.target: 定义运行状况检查请求中使用的URI，默认情况下为“ / ”。

trans-unit.source: defines the port used when connecting to a server to perform a health check (1.9.7). By default, equals the server port.
trans-unit.target: 定义连接到服务器以执行运行状况检查（1.9.7）时使用的端口。默认情况下，等于服务器端口。

trans-unit.source: defines the port used when connecting to a server to perform a health check (1.9.7). By default, equals the server port.
trans-unit.target: 定义连接到服务器以执行运行状况检查（1.9.7）时使用的端口。默认情况下，等于服务器端口。

trans-unit.source: defines trusted addresses (0.8.7, 0.7.63). When a request comes from a trusted address, an address from the “X-Forwarded-For” request header field will be used instead. In contrast to the regular addresses, trusted addresses are checked sequentially.
trans-unit.target: 定义受信任的地址（0.8.7、0.7.63）。当请求来自受信任的地址时，将使用“ X-Forwarded-For”请求标头字段中的地址代替。与常规地址相反，可信任地址是按顺序检查的。

trans-unit.source: deny usage of the STLS and STARTTLS commands;
trans-unit.target: 拒绝使用 STLS 和 STARTTLS 命令；

trans-unit.source: determines whether the whole response or only its header should be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 决定是将整个响应还是只将其头发送给客户端。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that emits single-pixel transparent GIF.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建发出单像素透明GIF的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that compresses responses of an HTTP server. The zlib library is required to build and run this module.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建可压缩 HTTP服务器响应的模块。zlib库是构建和运行此模块所必需的。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that allows an HTTP server to redirect requests and change URI of requests. The PCRE library is required to build and run this module.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建允许HTTP服务器重定向请求并更改请求URI的模块。构建和运行此模块需要PCRE库。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that implements the hash load balancing method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建实现哈希负载平衡方法的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that implements the ip_hash load balancing method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建实现ip_hash负载平衡方法的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that implements the least_conn load balancing method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建实现了minimum_conn负载平衡方法的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that implements the hash load balancing method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建实现哈希负载平衡方法的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that implements the least_conn load balancing method.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建实现了minimum_conn负载平衡方法的模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that makes it possible to store run-time state of an upstream group in a shared memory zone.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建模块，该模块可以将上游组的运行时状态存储在共享内存区域中。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that makes it possible to store run-time state of an upstream group in a shared memory zone.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建模块，该模块可以将上游组的运行时状态存储在共享内存区域中。

trans-unit.source: disables building a module that provides caching of connections to upstream servers.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建一个模块，该模块提供对到上游服务器的连接的缓存。

trans-unit.source: disables building an HTTP server proxying module.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建HTTP服务器代理模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_access_module module that allows limiting access to certain client addresses.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_access_module模块，该模块允许限制对某些客户端地址的访问。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_auth_basic_module module that allows limiting access to resources by validating the user name and password using the “HTTP Basic Authentication” protocol.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_auth_basic_module模块，该模块允许通过使用“ HTTP基本身份验证”协议验证用户名和密码来限制对资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_autoindex_module module that processes requests ending with the slash character (‘/’) and produces a directory listing in case the ngx_http_index_module module cannot find an index file.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_autoindex_module模块，以处理以斜杠字符（' / '）结尾的请求，并在ngx_http_index_module模块找不到索引文件的情况下生成目录列表。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_browser_module module that creates variables whose values depend on the value of the “User-Agent” request header field.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_browser_module模块，该模块创建的变量的值取决于“ User-Agent”请求标头字段的值。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_charset_module module that adds the specified charset to the “Content-Type” response header field and can additionally convert data from one charset to another.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_charset_module模块，该模块将指定的字符集添加到“ Content-Type”响应头字段中，并且可以将数据从一个字符集转换为另一个字符集。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_fastcgi_module module that passes requests to a FastCGI server.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建将请求传递到FastCGI服务器的ngx_http_fastcgi_module模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_geo_module module that creates variables with values depending on the client IP address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_geo_module模块，该模块创建的变量值取决于客户端IP地址。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_grpc_module module that passes requests to a gRPC server.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建将请求传递到gRPC服务器的ngx_http_grpc_module模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_limit_conn_module module that limits the number of connections per key, for example, the number of connections from a single IP address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_limit_conn_module模块，该模块限制每个键的连接数，例如，单个IP地址的连接数。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_limit_req_module module that limits the request processing rate per key, for example, the processing rate of requests coming from a single IP address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_limit_req_module模块，该模块限制每个密钥的请求处理速率，例如，来自单个IP地址的请求的处理速率。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_map_module module that creates variables with values depending on values of other variables.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_map_module模块，该模块创建的变量的值取决于其他变量的值。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_memcached_module module that obtains responses from a memcached server.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_memcached_module模块，该模块从Memcached服务器获取响应。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_mirror_module module that implements mirroring of an original request by creating background mirror subrequests.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_mirror_module模块，该模块通过创建后台镜像子请求来实现原始请求的镜像。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_referer_module module that can block access to a site for requests with invalid values in the “Referer” header field.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_referer_module模块，该模块可以阻止对“ Referer”标头字段中具有无效值的请求的站点访问。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_scgi_module module that passes requests to an SCGI server.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建将请求传递到SCGI服务器的ngx_http_scgi_module模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_split_clients_module module that creates variables for A/B testing.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_split_clients_module模块，该模块创建用于A / B测试的变量。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_ssi_module module that processes SSI (Server Side Includes) commands in responses passing through it.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建处理通过SSI（服务器端包含）命令的ngx_http_ssi_module模块的响应。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_userid_module module that sets cookies suitable for client identification.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_http_userid_module模块，该模块设置适用于客户端标识的cookie。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_http_uwsgi_module module that passes requests to a uwsgi server.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建将请求传递到uwsgi服务器的ngx_http_uwsgi_module模块。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_access_module module that allows limiting access to certain client addresses.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_access_module模块，该模块允许限制对某些客户端地址的访问。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_geo_module module that creates variables with values depending on the client IP address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_geo_module模块，该模块创建的变量的值取决于客户端IP地址。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_limit_conn_module module that limits the number of connections per key, for example, the number of connections from a single IP address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_limit_conn_module模块，该模块限制每个键的连接数，例如，单个IP地址的连接数。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_map_module module that creates variables with values depending on values of other variables.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_map_module模块，该模块创建的变量值取决于其他变量的值。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_return_module module that sends some specified value to the client and then closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_return_module模块，该模块向客户端发送一些指定的值，然后关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: disables building the ngx_stream_split_clients_module module that creates variables for A/B testing.
trans-unit.target: 禁用构建ngx_stream_split_clients_module模块，该模块创建用于A / B测试的变量。

trans-unit.source: disables compression for all proxied requests, ignoring other parameters;
trans-unit.target: 禁用所有代理请求的压缩,忽略其他参数。

trans-unit.source: disables passing a request to the next server.
trans-unit.target: 禁止向下一个服务器传递请求。

trans-unit.source: disables the IMAP protocol in mail proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 在邮件代理服务器中禁用IMAP协议。

trans-unit.source: disables the POP3 protocol in mail proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 在邮件代理服务器中禁用POP3协议。

trans-unit.source: disables the SMTP protocol in mail proxy server.
trans-unit.target: 在邮件代理服务器中禁用SMTP协议。

trans-unit.source: disables the setting of cookies and logging of the received cookies.
trans-unit.target: 禁用Cookie的设置和接收Cookie的记录。

trans-unit.source: disables the setting of cookies, but enables logging of the received cookies;
trans-unit.target: 禁用Cookie的设置,但可以记录收到的Cookie。

trans-unit.source: disables the usage of the PCRE library.

启用POP3 / IMAP4 / SMTP 邮件代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: enables building a module that adds the SSL/TLS protocol support to the mail proxy server. This module is not built by default. The OpenSSL library is required to build and run this module.

trans-unit.source: enables building a module that adds the SSL/TLS protocol support to the stream module. This module is not built by default. The OpenSSL library is required to build and run this module.

trans-unit.source: enables recursive address search (1.3.0, 1.2.1). If recursive search is disabled then instead of the original client address that matches one of the trusted addresses, the last address sent in “X-Forwarded-For” will be used. If recursive search is enabled then instead of the original client address that matches one of the trusted addresses, the last non-trusted address sent in “X-Forwarded-For” will be used.
trans-unit.target: 启用递归地址搜索（1.3.0，1.2.1）。如果禁用了递归搜索，则将使用“ X-Forwarded-For”中发送的最后一个地址，而不是与受信任地址之一匹配的原始客户端地址。如果启用了递归搜索，则将使用“ X-Forwarded-For”中发送的最后一个不受信任的地址，而不是与受信任的地址之一匹配的原始客户端地址。

trans-unit.source: instructs nginx to discard the request body.

instructs to make a separate bind() call for a given address:port pair. This is useful because if there are several listen directives with the same port but different addresses, and one of the listen directives listens on all addresses for the given port (*:port), nginx will bind() only to *:port. It should be noted that the getsockname() system call will be made in this case to determine the address that accepted the connection. If the setfib, backlog, rcvbuf, sndbuf, accept_filter, deferred, ipv6only, or so_keepalive parameters are used then for a given address:port pair a separate bind() call will always be made.
trans-unit.target: 指示对给定的 address ： port 对进行单独的 bind() 调用。因为如果有几个这是有用的 listen 同一端口，但不同的地址的指令，和的一个 listen 对给定端口（所有地址的指令监听 *: port ），将nginx的 bind() 只 *: port 。应该注意的是，在这种情况下将进行 getsockname() 系统调用，以确定接受连接的地址。如果 setfib ， backlog ， rcvbuf ， sndbuf ， accept_filter 然后使用给定 address accept_filter， deferred ， ipv6only 或 so_keepalive 参数： port 对将始终进行单独的 bind() 调用。

trans-unit.source: keeps the IP address and port, or the path to the UNIX-domain socket of the upstream server. If several servers were contacted during request processing, their addresses are separated by commas, e.g. “192.168.1.1:80, 192.168.1.2:80, unix:/tmp/sock”. If an internal redirect from one server group to another happens, initiated by “X-Accel-Redirect” or error_page, then the server addresses from different groups are separated by colons, e.g. “192.168.1.1:80, 192.168.1.2:80, unix:/tmp/sock : 192.168.10.1:80, 192.168.10.2:80”. If a server cannot be selected, the variable keeps the name of the server group.

trans-unit.source: nginx can be used to route requests to FastCGI servers which run applications built with various frameworks and programming languages such as PHP.
trans-unit.target: nginx可以用来路由请求到FastCGI服务器,这些服务器运行的应用程序是由各种框架和编程语言(如PHP)构建的。

trans-unit.source: nginx consists of modules which are controlled by directives specified in the configuration file. Directives are divided into simple directives and block directives. A simple directive consists of the name and parameters separated by spaces and ends with a semicolon (;). A block directive has the same structure as a simple directive, but instead of the semicolon it ends with a set of additional instructions surrounded by braces ({ and }). If a block directive can have other directives inside braces, it is called a context (examples: events, http, server, and location).
trans-unit.target: nginx由受配置文件中指定的指令控制的模块组成。伪指令分为简单伪指令和块伪指令。一个简单的指令由名称和参数组成，这些名称和参数之间用空格分隔，并以分号（ ; ）结尾。块指令的结构与简单指令的结构相同，但它以分号（而不是分号）结尾，并带有一组用括号（ { 和 } ）包围的附加指令。如果一个块指令在括号内可以有其他指令，则称为上下文（示例：events，http，server和location）。

trans-unit.source: nginx first searches for the most specific prefix location given by literal strings regardless of the listed order. In the configuration above the only prefix location is “/” and since it matches any request it will be used as a last resort. Then nginx checks locations given by regular expression in the order listed in the configuration file. The first matching expression stops the search and nginx will use this location. If no regular expression matches a request, then nginx uses the most specific prefix location found earlier.
trans-unit.target: 无论列出的顺序如何，nginx都会首先搜索文字字符串给定的最特定的前缀位置。在上面的配置中，唯一的前缀位置是“ / ”，由于它与任何请求都匹配，因此将被用作最后的手段。然后，nginx按照配置文件中列出的顺序检查由正则表达式指定的位置。第一个匹配的表达式将停止搜索，nginx将使用此位置。如果没有正则表达式与请求匹配，则nginx使用较早发现的最特定的前缀位置。

trans-unit.source: nginx has one master process and several worker processes. The main purpose of the master process is to read and evaluate configuration, and maintain worker processes. Worker processes do actual processing of requests. nginx employs event-based model and OS-dependent mechanisms to efficiently distribute requests among worker processes. The number of worker processes is defined in the configuration file and may be fixed for a given configuration or automatically adjusted to the number of available CPU cores (see worker_processes).
trans-unit.target: nginx有一个主进程和几个工作进程。主流程的主要目的是读取和评估配置，以及维护工作流程。工作进程对请求进行实际处理。 nginx使用基于事件的模型和依赖于操作系统的机制来有效地在工作进程之间分配请求。工作进程的数量在配置文件中定义，可以针对给定的配置固定，也可以自动调整为可用CPU内核的数量（请参阅worker_processes）。

trans-unit.source: nginx supports a variety of connection processing methods. The availability of a particular method depends on the platform used. On platforms that support several methods nginx will normally select the most efficient method automatically. However, if needed, a connection processing method can be selected explicitly with the use directive.
trans-unit.target: nginx支持多种连接处理方法。特定方法的可用性取决于所使用的平台。在支持多种方法的平台上，nginx通常会自动选择最有效的方法。但是，如果需要，可以使用use指令显式选择连接处理方法。

trans-unit.source: nginx supports the following command-line parameters:

nginx uses the locking mechanism to implement accept_mutex and serialize access to shared memory. On most systems the locks are implemented using atomic operations, and this directive is ignored. On other systems the “lock file” mechanism is used. This directive specifies a prefix for the names of lock files.
trans-unit.target: nginx使用锁定机制来实现accept_mutex并序列化对共享内存的访问。在大多数系统上，锁是使用原子操作实现的，并且该指令将被忽略。在其他系统上，使用“锁定文件”机制。该伪指令为锁定文件的名称指定前缀。
nginx变量对象，可写（从0.2.8开始）

trans-unit.source: nginx versions up to 0.6.25 supported the special name “*” which was erroneously interpreted to be a catch-all name. It never functioned as a catch-all or wildcard server name. Instead, it supplied the functionality that is now provided by the server_name_in_redirect directive. The special name “*” is now deprecated and the server_name_in_redirect directive should be used. Note that there is no way to specify the catch-all name or the default server using the server_name directive. This is a property of the listen directive and not of the server_name directive. See also “How nginx processes a request”. It is possible to define servers listening on ports *:80 and *:8080, and direct that one will be the default server for port *:8080, while the other will be the default for port *:80:
trans-unit.target: nginx最高版本为0.6.25的版本支持特殊名称“ * ”，该名称被错误地解释为通用名称。它从不用作通用或通配符服务器名称。相反，它提供了server_name_in_redirect指令现在提供的功能。现在不赞成使用特殊名称“ * ”，而应使用server_name_in_redirect指令。请注意，无法使用server_name指令指定通用名称或默认服务器。这是listen指令的属性，而不是server_name指令的属性。另请参阅“ nginx如何处理请求”。可以定义侦听端口*：80和*：8080的服务器，并指示其中一个将是端口*：8080的默认服务器，而另一个将是端口*：80的默认服务器：

trans-unit.source: njs scripts development and debugging can be performed from the command-line. The command-line utility is available after the installation of the Linux package or after building from the sources. Compared to njs running inside nginx, nginx objects (HTTP and Stream) are not available in the utility.
trans-unit.target: njs脚本的开发和调试可以从命令行执行。命令行实用程序在Linux 软件包安装之后或从源代码构建之后即可使用。与在nginx内部运行的njs相比，该实用程序中没有nginx对象（HTTP和Stream）。

trans-unit.source: path loader — Executes only once in 60 seconds after starting or reloading nginx. Normally, the loader reads the directory and stores data in nginx shared memory. The handler is called from the dedicated nginx process “nginx cache loader”.
trans-unit.target: 路径加载器-在启动或重新加载nginx之后的60秒内仅执行一次。通常，加载器读取目录并将数据存储在nginx共享内存中。从专用的nginx进程“ nginx缓存加载器”中调用该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: path manager — Executes periodically. Normally, the manager removes old files from the directory and updates nginx memory to reflect the changes. The handler is called from the dedicated “nginx cache manager” process.
trans-unit.target: 路径管理器-定期执行。通常，管理器从目录中删除旧文件并更新nginx内存以反映更改。从专用的“ nginx缓存管理器”进程中调用该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: proportionally reduces an image to the larger side size and crops extraneous edges by another side. To reduce by only one dimension, another dimension can be specified as “-”. In case of an error, the server will return code 415 (Unsupported Media Type). Parameter values can contain variables. When used along with the rotate parameter, the rotation happens before reduction.
trans-unit.target: 按比例将图像缩小到较大的一侧，并从另一侧裁剪多余的边缘。要仅减小一个尺寸，可以将另一个尺寸指定为“ - ”。发生错误时，服务器将返回代码415（不支持的媒体类型）。参数值可以包含变量。与 rotate 参数一起使用时，旋转发生在缩小之前。

trans-unit.source: proportionally reduces an image to the specified sizes. To reduce by only one dimension, another dimension can be specified as “-”. trans-unit.source: sends the response header to the client. The optional type parameter sets the value of the “Content-Type” response header field. If the value is an empty string, the “Content-Type” header field will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 将响应标头发送到客户端。可选的 type 参数设置“ Content-Type”响应头字段的值。如果值为空字符串，则不会发送“ Content-Type”标头字段。

trans-unit.source: sends the specified file content to the client. Optional parameters specify the initial offset and length of the data to be transmitted. The actual data transmission happens after the Perl handler has completed.
trans-unit.target: 向客户端发送指定的文件内容。可选参数指定要传输的数据的初始偏移量和长度。实际的数据传输是在Perl处理程序完成后进行的。
